--- select_singer_with_having.sql
SELECT
  SingerID
FROM
  Singers
GROUP BY
  SingerID
HAVING
  SingerID = 1

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      74,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  17,
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  9,
          end:  17,
          Name: "SingerID",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  32,
        Expr: &parser.TableName{
          end:   32,
          Ident: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  25,
            end:  32,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
        },
        Method: "",
        Num:    nil,
        Rows:   false,
      },
    },
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{
      &parser.Ident{
        pos:  44,
        end:  52,
        Name: "SingerID",
      },
    },
    Having: &parser.BinaryExpr{
      Op:   "=",
      Left: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  62,
        end:  70,
        Name: "SingerID",
      },
      Right: &parser.IntLit{
        pos:   73,
        end:   74,
        Value: "1",
      },
    },
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT SingerID FROM Singers GROUP BY SingerID HAVING SingerID = 1
